name: energycrisis
0:
”Alexa, open energy crisis”
”Alexa, start energy crisis”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: energy crisis
des:
Listen to this interactive story about a little girl, who becomes a doctoral student at just 13, and changes the world with the technology of hydro pyrolysis. All that waste oil from Unofficial McDonald's kitchen turns into green gold, actual bio-naphta we can use, but can this solve the energy crisis? Maybe Green Corporation, the new giant of the green economy can....
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
